body:
@tsuilouis This PR is facing CI issue.

> [2019-09-16T02:04:56.507Z] [ERROR] /home/jenkins/jenkins-slave/workspace/skywalking-ci-it/apm-sniffer/apm-sdk-plugin/light4j-plugins/light4j-plugin/src/main/java/org/apache/skywalking/apm/plugin/light4j/define/LightInstrumentation.java:21:1: Disallowed import - io.undertow.server.HttpServerExchange. [ImportControl]

1. in my `agent.conf`, I set the following properties:
```
agent.instance_properties[org]=apache-skywalking
```

2. after my service/agent startup or registered in skywaling, The Skywalking UI display `InstanceInfo`  as follows:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/12468337/64933411-c63b6580-d877-11e9-8442-7b2d4d25891f.png)

Here is the [test report](http://github.com/SkywalkingTest/agent-integration-test-report/tree/master/2019/9/tsuilouis/testReport-light4j-plugin-tests-2019-09-16-11-49.md) and [validate logs](http://35.227.88.23:49001/job/skywalking-agent-test/298/artifact/workspace/logs/validate_2019-09-16-11-49.log)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/31895647/64934504-d2c2bc80-d87d-11e9-8a47-bb761763fdb0.png)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/31895647/64934516-e0784200-d87d-11e9-9c21-97c532c5c490.png)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/31895647/64934520-e5d58c80-d87d-11e9-95a2-bb4f79836751.png)

@tsuilouis CI has some problem, please fix, may reason is 
```
skywalking-agent-test/workspace/source/skywalking/apm-sniffer/apm-sdk-plugin/light4j-plugins/light4j-plugin/src/main/java/org/apache/skywalking/apm/plugin/light4j/define/LightInstrumentation.java:21:1: Disallowed import - io.undertow.server.HttpServerExchange. [ImportControl]
Audit done.
```
@ascrutae Please check.
Got your point, @SummerOfServenteen . The PR looks good to me
As I see, there quite be the error. Maybe at this time, the elk is not ready. But the oap server still works.
.net core agent is not skywalking's officially yet. So, submit this at agent core repo.
@wu-sheng found out this problem caused by apm-sniffer/apm-sdk-plugin/undertow-plugins/undertow-2.x-plugin under 6.4.0, it is ok when i use the one under 6.3.0.

@zhaoyuguang 
tried version  6.5.0,  the problem caused by "Unable to find instance" has been resolved , but there seems still be other problem that make trace id stop changing.  It works correctly at first,  but stop changing again after a while.   Trying to find the reason now.
get undertow-2.x-plugin from 6.3.0, package it and upload it onto server's .../agent/plugins/, test and no conflict.
I I also have this problem.In what scenario did it happen?Are your applications concurrently large?
Half closing means, client disconnects from OAP, no matter what reason triggers this.
/run ci
ps., we use 1.4.* undertow.
We can't verify in every case. If you think there is an issue, I think it is better to fix and send pull request. There are too many possibilities for plugin.
But it will cause data to no longer be written to es, and after a period of time, there will be no data on the page.
I don't think that is the issue.
@wu-sheng I wanted to leave a top-level folder in case the light-4j team wanted to add plugins for other light-4j subprojects. I can remove it if you want.

> I wanted to leave a top-level folder in case the light-4j team wanted to add plugins for other light-4j subprojects. I can remove it if you want.

If you have plans for that, I am OK to keep this structure.
@zhaoyuguang CI passed, I think you could run tests again.

> Is the latest version is really is 6.3.0 version ?

I think the latest is 6.4.0, we just released it several days ago.

Here is the [test report](http://github.com/SkywalkingTest/agent-integration-test-report/tree/master/2019/9/tsuilouis/testReport-light4j-plugin-tests-2019-09-17-10-45.md) and [validate logs](http://35.227.88.23:49001/job/skywalking-agent-test/300/artifact/workspace/logs/validate_2019-09-17-10-45.log)
/run e2e
@kezhenxu94 Please confirm the fix.
/run ci
/run e2e
@dmsolr Feel free to join.
JDK8
This class is in the distribution. I am not sure why the error log shows up.
I think you need to debug and find out why the classpath scan is not working. It should be.
Need new support for Spring Kafka.
@stalary do you have interest to enhance this part?

> @stalary do you have interest to enhance this part?

Ok, I will solve it soon
@wu-sheng When spring-kafka exists, how can I enable spring-kafka-plugin by not launching the kafka pluginI need a little help.

> When spring-kafka exists, how can I enable spring-kafka-plugin by not launching the kafka pluginI need a little help.

What is the issue here? If both of them are exit span creators, then the first one should override the second automatically, if there is no across threads happening.

> > When spring-kafka exists, how can I enable spring-kafka-plugin by not launching the kafka pluginI need a little help.
> 
> What is the issue here? If both of them are exit span creators, then the first one should override the second automatically, if there is no across threads happening.


However, an error is reported when it passes through the kafka-plugin

> However, an error is reported when it passes through the kafka-plugin

Why? If we intercept the right place, then all APIs should be same. no matter who calls it.
I am not asking there must be a Spring-kafka plugin, but the kafka plugin should work as expected. In some cases, spring-xxx created a new API entrance, then we need a new plugin.
@wu-sheng ok,I got it

Such as from this error log, we are intercepting `KafkaProducer` constructor, right? 

> java.lang.ClassCastException: java.util.ArrayList cannot be cast to java.lang.String
at org.apache.skywalking.apm.plugin.kafka.ProducerConstructorMapInterceptor.onConstruct(ProducerConstructorMapInterceptor.java:34)

```
objInst.setSkyWalkingDynamicField(StringUtil.join(';', ((String) config.get("bootstrap.servers")).split(",")));
```

We did String cast directly, clearly for Spring Kafka, it is not a String type, right?

> Such as from this error log, we are intercepting `KafkaProducer` constructor, right?
> 
> > java.lang.ClassCastException: java.util.ArrayList cannot be cast to java.lang.String
> > at org.apache.skywalking.apm.plugin.kafka.ProducerConstructorMapInterceptor.onConstruct(ProducerConstructorMapInterceptor.java:34)
> 
> ```
> objInst.setSkyWalkingDynamicField(StringUtil.join(';', ((String) config.get("bootstrap.servers")).split(",")));
> ```
> 
> We did String cast directly, clearly for Spring Kafka, it is not a String type, right?

yes
@stalary I think if this is the only issue, we could a good fix, but you need to test whether this is the only issue.
Because the login is not the real login, you could bypass it easily. It is being treated as a security vulnerability, so have to remove it.
This UI enhancement is open to anyone who has interests to contribute. If you could send a pull request with a video to show how it will be. We are open to discuss there.
You need to find out why `IgnoredTracerContext` created.  In my mind, either agent hasn't registered to backend successfully, or sampling/ignore mechanism is working. No other case.
This wouldn't happen, if the trace segment has been sampled, then all upstream trace segments will be sampled automatically.
@kezhenxu94 Look like our E2E CI facing failure issue. Most of them are timeout or failure. Recently, I think we don't merge anything related to it. All failures show up today.
Shadow tracing context means you have plugin incompatible issue. But can't be sure which one. Recommend you to test plugin one by one, and only choose plugins you required.
@JaredTan95 Could you recheck this too?
@kezhenxu94 Need your recheck and confirmation.
Welcome to be 158th contributor of main repo :)
W/ light4j plugin merged, you need to update the component definition because the ID has been used.
Thanks for all your help @wu-sheng! I learned a lot from developing the light4j plugin.
/run ci
After you fix the conflicts and pass tests locally, please post your local test report here.

I found that an article had solved this problem. [](https://www.jianshu.com/p/52bbc503be19) .  I changed my codes like this:
![](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19252220/65208200-de54f400-dac6-11e9-857e-e473e312c6ce.png)

And the agent would print warning logs, but it would not print log like "intercept failure 
java.lang.NullPointerException".
@wu-sheng I have fix the conflicts and past the local test screenshot to the description of this PR, please help take a look the test result screenshot.
/run e2e
English only.
This means the OAP server unreachable.

but i have 5 project is already connect to OAP.
some project restart-up connect several times before it succeeds.
This is the network issue. You have to check at your own env.
@stalary Any update?
@wu-sheng I am very sorry that I am busy with my work these days. I will deal with it at the weekend
@dmsolr Thanks for your review, i have move the span creation of consumer to beforeMethod. Please help take a look again.

I have solved the first error, but I can't find the reason for the second one

`ERROR 2019-09-17 20:39:14:468 http-nio-9999-exec-5 InstMethodsInter : class[class org.apache.kafka.clients.producer.KafkaProducer] before method[doSend] intercept failure
java.lang.ClassCastException: org.springframework.kafka.core.KafkaTemplate$$Lambda$522/515652386 cannot be cast to org.apache.skywalking.apm.agent.core.plugin.interceptor.enhance.EnhancedInstance
at`

I see lamda appearing, if it is related to the JDK version
I I also have this problem. It works after  restarting skywalking-oap-server
resolved by #3410

@stalary Could you find the codes of `KafkaTemplate$$Lambda$522/515652386`? What is the lamda in the source code? 

Look like the plugin is assuming this is an enhanced class, but it isn't.
@wu-sheng yes, I printed all the parameters through the log, but found that the second parameter was empty, so I have no idea for the moment. I will think about it at the weekend.
OK. Take your time, if you could find the codebase, we could talk about it.

`DEADLINE_EXCEEDED` only means timeout, the segment can't send to upstream in time(10s in default), so error shows up. If this keeps showing up, you may have a backend performance issue or network issue.
@Daych Read #3491
@wu-sheng Thanks for your helping, another issue I can found is the UI is missing the Logout function, can you add it back also ?

It's because nacos-plugin didn't set telemetry instance id.
```
TelemetryRelatedContext.INSTANCE.setId(selfAddress.toString());
```
I'm gonna send PR to fix it.

> Thanks for your helping, another issue I can found is the UI is missing the Logout function, can you add it back also ?

Old login/login has been confirmed as a security vulnerability. There is no adding it back. Only option is someone contributing a new good one.

@wu-sheng this problem happended again, in jconsole, threads "grpc-default-executor-*" all blocked by "elasticsearch[scheduler][T#1]" which is in waiting status, and this problem happened 1hour ago, and seems it will never recovered from it.
from oapServer's log, "org.apache.skywalking.oap.server.core.storage.ttl.DataTTLKeeperTimer - 61 [pool-16-thread-1] INFO  [] - Beginning to remove expired metrics from the storage.", and 2 minutes after is "Grpc server thread pool is full...", is the data keeper executor took too many ElasticSearch time?
/run ci
If they are blocked, that is expected from design level, You need to find out why elasticsearch doesn't response. Check your ES server status and monitoring tool.

yes i will investigate our ES, but what i think is the data keeper should be the lowest priority task compare to others, especially those to save metrics/trace or register service/serviceInstance into ES, so can the data keeper modified to delete older datas only in "Idle" time?

> yes i will investigate our ES, but what i think is the data keeper should be the lowest priority task compare to others, especially those to save metrics/trace or register service/serviceInstance into ES, so can the data keeper modified to delete older datas only in "Idle" time?

Delete? The 6.4.0(6.3.0+) delete only happens in middle night, and once per day. You may read the delete logs, but in ElasticSearch implementation, it would execute like that.
ps., after running oapServer on two servers, our ES(3 nodes) become heavy loaded all the time, cpu/heap/load always off the chart.
that's strange, from the log, i can only surpose it is running the data keeper executor before thread pool is full.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/49858897/65306905-1a688180-dbb9-11e9-9796-3f084b82636a.png)
Read `ElasticsearchStorageTTL`, if you will find the delete wouldn't happen in every 5 mins. This is only the check running every 5 mins.

we plan to use skywalking on our production environment, but for the moment it can't been done without solving this problem first, could you give use some advice on ES heavy load after running oapServer, for example, to disable some functionality that we may not use.
or where to find a stable version of skywalking?

Really, there is nothing I can do. 
There are plenty of users using the project in production environments. Some of them are supporting several TB traces per day.
We can't provide the ElasticSearch service for you. ElasticSearch is a stable, powerful and widely used data platform, so you should be able to find the solution by yourself.

The only thing I could say is, either you don't set your ElasticSearch right(we highlighted some in our FAQ, https://github.com/apache/skywalking/blob/master/docs/en/FAQ/ES-Server-FAQ.md), or your ElasticSearch cluster is too small.
You can't. That is the JVM requirement.
seem like the pulsar-plugin does not need use jdk8, because you don't use any feature of jdk8.

> seem like the pulsar-plugin does not need use jdk8, because you don't use any feature of jdk8.

@codelipenghui Please confirm. If so, please change the JDK compile requirement, and this plugin could stay in default, rather than optional. Notice, it is about the plugin source codes, nothing related to Pulsar source code JDK version.
@dmsolr @wu-sheng I misunderstood it, will move it back, thanks.
@SummerOfServenteen how do you fix this issue? i met this too in 6.4.0, run with docker in k8s.
Please follow setup document. Your target application timezone doesn't match your browser. Change either side to make it matched
/run e2e
/run e2e
What do you mean can't enhance? It looks like just intercepting return value, and change it to our own callback.

> What do you mean can't enhance? It looks like just intercepting return value, and change it to our own callback.

The second parameter I got in the interceptor was `KafkaTemplate$$Lambda$1314/327246707`, I don't understand why he wasn't enhanced.
